Posts.Content: wow this makes me angry too! whats a bad cancer?arghh any abnormal cell is bad and has potential to become more,if abnormal is detected,get rid of it i say! i have abnormal cells in my cervix and polyps in my bowel (which have now been removed) who know what couldve happened if they were was left alone,i went to doc about my sore/itchy nipple and said it was hormonal,wtf,im really scared that i have more 'abnormal cells' somewhere else as i seen to be a ball of them.the itch had been ok today but i can assure you if this continues i will be back for a second opinion
Posts.Title: BBC Report
